entry.title: Sunday night: Light snow. Low minus 1 with temperature rising to plus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning early this evening and ending late this evening then 40 percent chance of flurries late this evening and after midnight then 40 percent chance of rain showers overnight. Risk of freezing rain early this evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h. Low minus 1 with temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light late in the morning. High plus 4. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers early in the evening. Clearing in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Sunday 12 March 2023
